name: Playwright Tests

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: [self-hosted, linux]

    defaults:
      run:
        working-directory: playwright

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node
        uses: AD/txp-ghac/.github/actions/setup-node@main
        with:
          node-version: 20
          npmrc: ${{ secrets.NPMRC }}

      - name: Setup Chrome
        uses: AD/txp-ghac/.github/actions/setup-chrome@main

      - name: Verify Chrome
        run: google-chrome --version

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run tests
        run: npx playwright test

      - name: Upload Playwright report
        if: always()
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: playwright-report
          path: playwright/playwright-report
